arcade.patch.vis

Class PatchDrawerHex

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.core.vis.Drawer
      • arcade.patch.vis.PatchDrawer
        • arcade.patch.vis.PatchDrawerHex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchDrawerHex.PatchCells, PatchDrawerHex.PatchGrid, PatchDrawerHex.PatchLayers

    public abstract class PatchDrawerHex
extends PatchDrawer
    Container for patch-specific Drawer classes for hexagonal patches.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • PatchDrawerHex

               java.lang.String name,

               sim.util.gui.ColorMap map,
               java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double bounds)
        Creates a PatchDrawer for hexagonal patch simulations.
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel the drawer is attached to
        name - the name of the drawer
        length - the length of array (x direction)
        width - the width of array (y direction)
        depth - the depth of array (z direction)
        map - the color map for the array
        bounds - the size of the drawer within the panel
